roleset.name: to bother, harass

example.name: passive
example.text: *-2 Pestered [*]by bosses , brokers , clients and media people and pushed [*] by their own egos , [Wall Street economists] -2 are forecasting about everything from broad economic trends to the dinkiest monthly indicator .
example.arg: [*]by bosses , brokers , clients and media people

roleset.note: PESTER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pester' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from pester.01-v predicate notes)
